description: When trying to use TypeHinting in a Python application, an OSError is raised with the message "TypeError: 'TypeHinting' is not supported by this platform." This indicates that the platform does not have the necessary libraries installed to support TypeHinting
output:
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "<stdin>", line 1, in <module>
    def add_two_numbers(a: int, b: int) -> int:
IndentationError: expected an indented block
